newsitem.title: USA: Hyundai unit, IBM in digital TV agreement.
newsitem.headline: Hyundai unit, IBM in digital TV agreement.

text.p: TV/COM International Inc, a unit of Hyundai Electronics Industries Co Ltd, on Monday said it entered into a digital broadcasting agreement with International Business Machines Corp.
Under the agreement, TV/COM will supply digital video broadcast set-top boxes that receive and decode the digitally compressed video, audio and data signals transmitted by IBM's system.

As part of IBM's digital broadcasting solution, TV/COM said its set-tops will receive the new data and broadcast services enabled by IBM's system, including near video-on-demand, impulse pay-per-view and future interactive data services delivered directly to the TV or Personal Computer.
